ChosenEntrantListFragment - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
Displays a listview of chosen entrants that includes pending entrants, cancelled entrants, and entrants that accepted and invitation to the event Will fetch a list of the above from the database to be displayed in the listview Navigated to from EntrantListSelectionFragment
